name: Pokémon Advanced
overview: An improvement type hack of Pokémon FireRed. Features • New attacks • Fairy Type • 1400+ Pokémon • Shiny rate increased to 5% • Some updated sprites • EV/IV Viewer • Physical/Special split • BW2 repel system • Capture EXP system • Day and night system • In-battle mega evolution • 48 mega evolution's • All legendaries available • Increased difficulty • Ash Greninja
